be_first: Be the first to start a discussion!
hero_title: Every Girl Deserves Education & A Bright Future
mission_text: To empower and mentor young women and girls in South Sudan to rise beyond societal limitations through education, storytelling, and mentorship helping them realize their worth and build independent, confident lives.
vision_text: A South Sudan where every girl grows with courage, education, and purpose , free to dream, lead, and transform her community.
goal_text: By 2030, we aim to connect 10,000 girls with resources for undergraduate opportunities, conferences, and internships.
help_reach_goal: Help Us Reach Our Goal By:
joining_platform: Joining our platform to learn and connect
becoming_mentor: Becoming a mentor to guide young women
spreading_word: Spreading the word to reach more girls
